abstract: Michigan Gov Rick Snyder accepts resignation of state's top environmental regulator Dan Wyant, who is departing due to drinking water crisis in Flint.
lead_paragraph: Dan Wyant, Michigan’s top environmental regulator, resigned after children in Flint were found to have higher blood-lead levels because of a cost-cutting move.

headline.main: Michigan: Regulator Quits in Drinking Water Crisis
headline.print_headline: Michigan: Regulator Quits in Drinking Water Crisis

snippet: Dan Wyant, Michigan’s top environmental regulator, resigned after children in Flint were found to have higher blood-lead levels because of a cost-cutting move.
